SEARCH
Package DataAccess

Class GameDAO

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.GameDAO
public class GameDAO extends Object
Data access object class that provides methods to manage the Games in the DB.

      public void InsertGame(Game game) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Creates new game in DB.
      Parameters:
      game - Game that will be created
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - Thrown if gameId exists.

    • FindGame

      public Game FindGame(Game game) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Finds specific game in DB.
      Parameters:
      game - Game that is being searched for in DB.
      Returns:
      Returns game if found.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - Thrown if game does not exist.

    • FindAllGames

      public Collection<Game> FindAllGames() throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Finds all games in DB.
      Returns:
      Collection of games that will be set and returned in method.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - Thrown if no games exist.

    • ClaimSpot

      public void ClaimSpot(User u, Game game) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Claims a spot in a specific game in DB.
      Parameters:
      u - user that is joining/claiming game.
      game - game that will be claimed.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - Thrown if game is full, username does not exist, or game does not exist.

    • RemoveGame

      public void RemoveGame(Game game) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Deletes specific game in DB.
      Parameters:
      game - Game to be deleted.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - Thrown if game does not exist.

      public void clearAll()
      All games removed from DB.

    • UpdateGame

      public void UpdateGame(Game game, String gameName) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Updates name of game in DB.
      Parameters:
      game - Game to be edited.
      gameName - New name of game.
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - Thrown if game does not exist.
